# rlR: Deep Reinforcement learning in R

## Installation
```{r}
devtools::install_github("compstat-lmu/rlR", dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Usage
```{r}
library(rlR)
env = makeGymEnv("CartPole-v0")
listAvailAgent()
```


```{r}
agent = makeAgent("AgentDQN", env)
agent$updatePara("console", FALSE)
system.time({
#perf = agent$learn(1000)  # umcomment this line to run yourself which might take a while
})
#perf$plot()
```
